1.0.0.name: wordpress/shiro
1.0.0.description: Shiro is a clean and minimal three-column CMS and blog theme by pixxels.at. A responsive layout optimizes the theme for mobile devices. You can customize the theme by using your own logo, color and background. For more instructions take a look at the theme's website. Shiro is ready to translate and is available in English and German.
